welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Adrian, a charming city known for its friendly people, rich history, and beautiful architecture. We hope you take the time to explore all that this city has to offer and enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lenawee County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lenawee County Airport is reserved for private flights and VIP passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toledo Express Airport serves all commercial flights and includes various amenities such as restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Toledo Express Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing services such as fueling and aircraft maintenance.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toledo Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Toledo Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
